name: monwar.io
description:
Create an army of heroes to protect the king in a very 2D style. Play with the face of love. Knob knob decorated with knight Build up villages, upgrade resources to produce gold, stone and meat to create more powerful monsters. Fighting with other players coming into the room is a game that requires internet to play.

More than 20 military styles.
Create a pig house to adjust food sources.
2D RTS game
Can play zone 3 world.
Show High Scores

How To PLAY

W A S D and  MOUSE

on Html

http://monwar.io/
